title: Mike Pence says he congratulated Trump at Carter funeral service
shortDescription: Mike Pence had not been seen publicly with Donald Trump since the former president pressured his VP to reject Electoral College votes on Jan. 6, 2021.

title: Supreme Court to review Biden rule to cancel defrauded students' debt
shortDescription: The Biden administration rule made it easier for students claiming their colleges defrauded them to apply for loan forgiveness.

title: Trump's Ukraine envoy: World must reinstate 'maximum pressure' on Iran
shortDescription: Trump's incoming envoy Keith Kellogg spoke about returning to a policy of 'maximum pressure' on Iran during an event Saturday in Paris.

title: DOJ asks court to speed up release of Trump 2020 election report
shortDescription: A federal appeals court cleared the release of special counsel Jack Smith's report on Donald Trump. The Justice Department wants it out even faster.

title: Trump's Mideast envoy meets Netanyahu amid ceasefire push
shortDescription: Steve Witkoff met the Israeli prime minister on Saturday following a visit to Doha amid efforts to secure a hostage deal and Gaza ceasefire.

title: 'Buy us!': Greenland shocked and intrigued by Trump's zeal
shortDescription: A staged joke or serious threat? Trump seems intent on controlling a territory that's been part of the Danish crown since 1830. Here's how Greenland feels.

title: After President-elect Trump's conviction, could he lose some rights?
shortDescription: Trump is the first former or incoming U.S. president to receive a criminal sentence. What you need to know about his rights.

title: Biden says he won't pardon himself before leaving White House
shortDescription: Joe Biden said Friday he won't pardon himself, blasted Meta's decision to cut fact-checkers and reiterated he thinks he would have defeated Trump.

title: Biden says economy is 'best in the world' after last jobs report
shortDescription: The economy added 256,000 job in December, the Labor Department reported on Friday.

title: Firefighting aircraft could still fly during Biden visit | Fact check
shortDescription: Firefighting aircraft could continue operating in restricted airspace as long as they coordinated with air traffic control, according to the FAA.

title: Biden to deliver farewell address Wednesday evening
shortDescription: President Joe Biden is set to give a farewell primetime address to the nation next Wednesday at 8 p.m., days before he leaves the White House.

title: Trump Organization creates new conflict of interest policy
shortDescription: The Trump Organization released a new plan Friday to ward off ethics questions with new administration

title: Trump's felony sentence pleases neither Democrats nor Republicans
shortDescription: The president-elect's sentencing after being convicted of 34 felony counts in hush-money case draws a wide range of reactions from supporters, critics

title: No, Trump did not pledge to ban all porn in the US | Fact check
shortDescription: The image is a fabrication. There is no record of the post on Trump's X profile.

title: Trump discusses viral exchange with Obama at Jimmy Carter's funeral
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump spoke about the now-viral exchange he had with former President Barack Obama at Jimmy Carter's memorial service in D.C.

title: Audio: Listen to Trump's sentencing hearing
shortDescription: New York Judge Juan Merchan made public audio of President-elect Donald Trump's sentencing hearing.

title: Trump attacks Newsom as Biden pledges wildfire aid for California
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump blamed California Gov. Gavin Newsom for the southern California wildfires. President Joe Biden pledged 180 days of aid.

title: Trump was sentenced in NY criminal hush money case. What happens next?
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump was sentenced Friday in his New York criminal hush money case. But he has already pledged to appeal.

title: Trump, tariffs and the Motor City: Ford boss gets surprise call
shortDescription: Ford Motor Co.'s Bill Ford says a "long, long" and "terrific" talk with Trump leaves him confident president-elect supports auto industry, workers.

title: Trump becomes first ex-president sentenced for a crime: recap
shortDescription: Judge Juan Merchan imposed an "unconditional discharge‚Äù that means Trump receives no prison time or probation. Trump continues to appeal conviction.
